What book is The movie The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies based on?

The movieThe Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies is based on the bookThe Hobbit: Deluxe Pocket Editionwritten byÂ  J. R. R. Tolkien

The Hobbit: Deluxe Pocket EditionPublished by Houghton Mifflin Harcourt - 10/30/2012

Bilbo Baggins, a respectable, well-to-do hobbit, lives comfortably in his hobbit-hole until the day the wandering wizard Gandalf chooses him to take part in an adventure from which he may never return.

Related books / From the author(s)

The Hobbit: Deluxe Pocket Edition

written byJ. R. R. Tolkien

Published by Houghton Mifflin Harcourt - 10/30/2012

Bilbo Baggins, a respectable, well-to-do hobbit, lives comfortably in his hobbit-hole until the day the wandering wizard Gandalf chooses him to take part in an adventure from which he may never return.

The Letters of J.R.R. Tolkien

written byJ.R.R. Tolkien

Published by HarperCollins - 2/21/2014

This collection will entertain all who appreciate the art of masterful letter writing. The Letters of J.R.R Tolkien sheds much light on Tolkien's creative genius and grand design for the creation of a whole new world: Middle-earth. Featuring a radically expanded index, this volume provides a valuable research tool for all fans wishing to trace the evolution of THE HOBBIT and THE LORD OF THE RINGS.

The HOBBIT

written byJ. R. R. TOLKIEN

1/1/1994

Bilbo Baggins is drawn into a quest by the wizard Gandalf and must face evil ogres, savage wolves, giant spiders, uknown dangers, and Smaug, a great dragon who is the terror of the entire countryside.

Did you know that the movie The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies is based on the book The Hobbit: Deluxe Pocket Edition?

After the Dragon leaves the Lonely Mountain, the people of Lake-town see a threat coming. Orcs, dwarves, elves and people prepare for war. Bilbo sees Thorin going mad and tries to help. Meanwhile, Gandalf is rescued from the Necromancer's prison and his rescuers realize who the Necromancer is.
